credit_line: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
title: Shaving bowl
description: Slightly everted cylindrical form with pinched indentation at rim, two mask handles; white ground with blue, green, and ochre armorial decoration of shield surmounted by crown and flanked by two dalmations, and above star-shaped madellion; swags and foliate forms below rim and above base.
name: Shaving bowl
